concept.title: XML Flattener
concept.shortdesc: The XML Flattener processor flattens a valid XML document embedded in a string field and adds the flattened data to the record as additional fields.

conbody.p: XML Flattener processoroverviewprocessorsXML FlattenerFor example, let's assume that a string field contains the following XML:
You can use the XML Flattener to flatten the data into the following fields:
conbody.codeblock: contact.name: NAME contact.name#type: maiden contact.phone(0): (111)111-1111 contact.phone(1): (222)222-2222
conbody.p: When you configure the XML Flattener, you specify the field that contains the XML data and the XML element that indicates the end of a record. You can optionally configure the string used to separate entity names and attributes in the flattened field names.
